授業方法: Each session will consist of a few different activities. Most sessions will begin by sharing out-of-class writing, such as journals and essay drafts. During sharing activities, students will work in groups to read, discuss, and provide feedback on each other's writings. This will be followed by textbook study, usually in pairs. At the end of the lesson, the teacher will comment on students' writings and point out strengths and weaknesses and also offer general advice. In some classes, a quiz or timed writing assignment will replace some of the other work.

第1回: Introduction to process writing and how to format paragraphs.
第4回:
Write Essay 1, Version 2 (E1V2)
Study for Quiz 1 (Q1)
Write Journal 2 (J2)
Textbook Homework
